titleStmt.title: Sound things asserted first in the Kings own words, secondly from late experience, thirdly from Scipture truth, fourthly according to reason and equity : and certain things opened ... by way of inquiry thereupon ... being intended for the good of the King ... and all persons under him ... / by ... Humphery Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
